text: Muhammad Hamza (20 March 1929 â€“ 29 August 2021) was a Pakistani politician. He was a member of Senate of Pakistan from March 2012 to March 2018 and member of the National Assembly of Pakistan between 1985 and 1999. He had been a member of the West Pakistan Legislative Assembly from 1962 to 1969. Hamza was born in Ludhiana, British Raj. Hamza died of COVID-19 on 29 August 2021 in Punjab, Pakistan at the age of 92. ==References== Category:1929 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Politicians from Punjab, Pakistan Category:Deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic in Pakistan
title: Muhammad Hamza
